casebody.data:
George H. BORNSIDE and Bette B. Bornside v. TENET HEALTHSYSTEM MEMORIAL MEDICAL CENTER, INC. d/b/a Memorial Medical Center (Formerly Mercy Hospital); Dr._Farhat (Believed to be David William Farhat, M.D.); Nicholas D. Pappas, M.D.; Rudolph M. Franklin, M.D.; and Jose L. Garcia-Oller, M.D. No. 2003-CC-1235. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Sept. 19, 2003.

VICTORY, J., would grant the writ.

TRAYLOR, J., would grant the writ.

WEIMER, J., would grant the writ.
